entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor of Transfiguration at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: auror training
entities.description: A three-year program for students to become Aurors.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic that looks into the records of those applying to be Aurors.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

relationships.description: The Ministry is affiliated with Auror training, as they look into the records of those applying to be Aurors.
Harry Potter has a chance of becoming an Auror.
Professor McGonagall defends Harry Potter against Professor Umbridge's accusations.
The Ministry employs Professor Umbridge, who is investigating the records of those applying to be Aurors.
Harry Potter has a similar chance of becoming an Auror as Dumbledore has of returning to Hogwarts.
